thread.title: Radev refused to guide our delegation to NATO – 2024-06-27 13:53:45
thread.title_full: Radev refused to guide our delegation to NATO – 2024-06-27 13:53:45

author: world today news
title: Radev refused to guide our delegation to NATO – 2024-06-27 13:53:45
text:
Rumen Radev President Rumen Radev didn’t settle for the proposal of the Council of Ministers to guide the Bulgarian delegation and take part within the assembly of the heads of state and authorities in Washington. This was introduced by the press workplace of the top of state. He refuses to be a pacesetter, because the workplace provided him, due to commitments that our nation will make relating to the battle in Ukraine. The latter is recorded within the Bulgarian place adopted by the cupboard.
The Head of State and Supreme Commander-in-Chief has at all times insisted and labored for the modernization of the Armed Forces, for rising the nationwide protection capability, for strengthening Bulgaria’s contribution to strengthening the deterrent and protection potential of NATO’s jap flank.
From the primary day of the battle in Ukraine, the top of state strongly condemned the Russian aggression. At nationwide and worldwide boards, President Radev has at all times supported all components of the collective method to guaranteeing safety, rising protection capabilities, implementing the Alliance’s regional plans and rising protection assets, the press workplace added.
On the similar time, President Radev doesn’t settle for some provisions of the framework positions adopted by the Council of Ministers, regarding commitments that our nation undertakes relating to the battle in Ukraine. And on this regard, the top of state doesn’t settle for the proposal of the Council of Ministers to guide the Bulgarian delegation.
Yesterday, the Council of Ministers accredited Bulgaria’s framework positions for the NATO summit, which is able to happen on July Sept. 11 in Washington. With the identical choice, President Rumen Radev is proposed to guide the Bulgarian delegation, to current the accepted framework positions and, on their foundation, “to approve and/or affirm” the paperwork introduced on the assembly. The delegation additionally consists of the Prime Minister and Minister of Overseas Affairs Dimitar Glavchev, the press workplace recalled.
On June 21, the federal government data service introduced that appearing Prime Minister and Minister of Overseas Affairs Dimitar Glavchev, in addition to President Rumen Radev, will take part within the upcoming NATO Summit, which is able to happen from July 9 to 11 in Washington.
#Radev #refused #lead #delegation #NATO
